name: Light Guard
description:
Join Sunny and Moonie in this adventure to protect the sun and the moonlight. The enemy is fierce, but if you join forces with a friend victory shall light upon you.

Call a friend to join in this adventure while sharing the keyboard. Remember to be careful, Sunny petrifies without the sunlight and Moonie petrifies without the moonlight (so good there is two of them, huh?). 

The light orb of sun and moon also helps it's defenders by throwing power orbs that grant them additional power.
